mutants.code:
from collections import defaultdict
import heapq

def calculate_minimum_height(n, W, widths):
    widths.sort(reverse=True)
    B = [0]
    heapq.heapify(B)
    ans = 1
    for width in widths:
        v = heapq.heappop(B)
        v = -1 * v
        if v >= width:
            v = v - width
        else:
            ans += 1
            heapq.heappush(B, -1 * (W - width))
        heapq.heappush(B, -1 * v)
    return ans

from collections import defaultdict
import heapq

def calculate_minimum_height(n, W, widths):
    widths.sort(reverse=True)
    B = [0]
    heapq.heapify(B)
    ans = 0
    for width in widths:
        v = heapq.heappop(B)
        v = -1 * v
        if v >= width:
            v = v - width
        else:
            ans += 1
            heapq.heappush(B, --1 * (W - width))
        heapq.heappush(B, -1 * v)
    return ans
